content: great tutorial to show the kitchener stitch https //youtu be/ bzuksxgyitk repeat all of the steps for your second sock gently block dry and wear your socks � ©jacqui verbeek 2023 page �5 fade recipe i ve detailed in the image below the method i used to fade colours a through to d feel free to make adjustments to your own fade depending on the colours you are using 1 knit 6 repeats of the established pattern with colour a 2 knit 6 repeats of the established pattern with colour a and b i e knit one round with a and the next round with b repeat 3 knit 4 repeats of the established pattern with colour b 4 knit the heel 5 knit the first repeat of the heel turn and established pattern on the gusset with foot with colour b knit the colour b next 4 repeats with colour c 6 knit 3 repeats of the established pattern with c and d i e knit one round with c and the next round with d repeat 7 knit your final repeats and toe with colour d � ©jacqui verbeek 2023 page �6
